huh?\""},{"lineNumber":73480,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あら、ランス君」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, Rance-kun.\""},{"lineNumber":73481,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ご無沙汰しておりますわ、ランスさま」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's been a while, Lord Rance.\""},{"lineNumber":73482,"originalJapaneseLine":"司令部の一角には、リーザスの部隊、","translatedEnglishLine":"In a section of the command headquarters, there was the Leesas unit,"},{"lineNumber":73483,"originalJapaneseLine":"大陸一華やかな部隊と言われる","translatedEnglishLine":"said to be the most glamorous unit on the continent,"},{"lineNumber":73484,"originalJapaneseLine":"金の軍ことリーザス親衛隊がいた。","translatedEnglishLine":"the Golden Army, also known as the Leesas Guard."},{"lineNumber":73485,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんでここに？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Why are you here?\""},{"lineNumber":73486,"originalJapaneseLine":"「リア様がここまで来る以上、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Since Lady Ria came all the way here,"},{"lineNumber":73487,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私達だけが城に残るわけにいかないでしょう？」","translatedEnglishLine":"it wouldn't do for just us to stay at the castle, right?\""},{"lineNumber":73488,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それもそうか。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's true."},{"lineNumber":73489,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ジュリアはどうした？」","translatedEnglishLine":"What about Julia?\""},{"lineNumber":73490,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そちらでおねむですわ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"She's sleeping over there...\""},{"lineNumber":73491,"originalJapaneseLine":"「すぴー、すぴょんょん……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Suu-pee, supyon-nyon...\""},{"lineNumber":73492,"originalJapaneseLine":"　んふふ、もうたべられない……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Hehe, I can't eat anymore...\""},{"lineNumber":73493,"originalJapaneseLine":"ジュリアは椅子を三つ並べた上に寝転がり","translatedEnglishLine":"Julia was lying down across three lined-up chairs,"},{"lineNumber":73494,"originalJapaneseLine":"幸せそうに眠っていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"sleeping happily."},{"lineNumber":73495,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ま、いつも通りか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, as usual...\""},{"lineNumber":73496,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それよりも後ろの錚々-ｿｳｿｳ-たる方々を……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"More than that, those prominent people behind...\""},{"lineNumber":73497,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランスさまにどうにかして頂きたいような……」","translatedEnglishLine":"It seems like they want Lord Rance to do something about them...\""},{"lineNumber":73498,"originalJapaneseLine":"「後ろの錚々たる方々？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The prominent people behind?\""},{"lineNumber":73499,"originalJapaneseLine":"パーテーションで区切られた司令部の一角を見ると、","translatedEnglishLine":"Looking at a corner of the command headquarters separated by a partition,"},{"lineNumber":73500,"originalJapaneseLine":"各国の姫達が静かに睨み合っていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"the princesses of various countries were quietly glaring at each other."},{"lineNumber":73501,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あーっ、ダーリンだー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, it's Darling!\""},{"lineNumber":73502,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Rance...\""},{"lineNumber":73503,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こんばんは、兄様」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Good evening, big brother.\""},{"lineNumber":73504,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんや、夜更かしさんやね、ランス」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What's this, a night owl, huh Rance?\""},{"lineNumber":73505,"originalJapaneseLine":"「また喧嘩しとったのか？　お前ら」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Were you guys fighting again?\""},{"lineNumber":73506,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んーん、そんなのしてないよー。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, we weren't doing anything like that.\""},{"lineNumber":73507,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それに喧嘩って同じ","translatedEnglishLine":"Besides, fighting is something"},{"lineNumber":73508,"originalJapaneseLine":"　レベルの人同士がすることよ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"that people of the same level do, right?\""},{"lineNumber":73509,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あらー？　なにか言いたいのかしら？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh? Do you want to say something?"},{"lineNumber":73510,"originalJapaneseLine":"　リーザスの女王は」","translatedEnglishLine":"The Queen of Leesas?\""},{"lineNumber":73511,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んーんー？　別になにもー？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm? Not really?\""},{"lineNumber":73512,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まったく……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Good grief...\""},{"lineNumber":73513,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まあまあ、今日くらいええんちゃうかな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, well, it's fine just for today, isn't it?\""},{"lineNumber":73514,"originalJapaneseLine":"コパンドンがこそっとランスにだけ耳打ちする。","translatedEnglishLine":"Copandon whispered secretly to Rance only."},{"lineNumber":73515,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こうしとる方が皆落ち着くんよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Everyone feels calmer this way."},{"lineNumber":73516,"originalJapaneseLine":"　口には出さんけどな」","translatedEnglishLine":"Though nobody says it out loud.\""},{"lineNumber":73517,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そんなもんか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is that so...\""},{"lineNumber":73518,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しかし、各国の姫全員集合か……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"However, all the princesses of each country gathered...\""},{"lineNumber":73519,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そう考えると中々すごいメンバーのような","translatedEnglishLine":"When you think about it, it seems like quite an impressive group."},{"lineNumber":73520,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あれ？　そういえばシーラがいないな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh? Come to think of it, Shila isn't here.\""},{"lineNumber":73521,"originalJapaneseLine":"「一人だけ逃げたのよ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Only one of them ran away!\""},{"lineNumber":73522,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ひどいよねー、","translatedEnglishLine":"That's awful, isn't it?"},{"lineNumber":73523,"originalJapaneseLine":"　きっとダーリンなんてどうでもいいんだわ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"She probably doesn't care about Darling at all!\""},{"lineNumber":73524,"originalJapaneseLine":"「変なことを言わないで下さい……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Please don't say such strange things...\""},{"lineNumber":73525,"originalJapaneseLine":"　シーラ様にはすることがあるだけです」","translatedEnglishLine":"Lady Shila just has things to do.\""},{"lineNumber":73526,"originalJapaneseLine":"「お、クリームちゃん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh, Cream-chan."},{"lineNumber":73527,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんか知ってるのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Do you know something?\""},{"lineNumber":73528,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……いえ、私も詳しくは存じ上げないのですが」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...No, I don't know the details either, but\""},{"lineNumber":73529,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんでも数日前にパットン皇子がやってきて、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Apparently, a few days ago Prince Patton came,"},{"lineNumber":73530,"originalJapaneseLine":"　彼女を連れて行ったとか……","translatedEnglishLine":"and took her away...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怖いです……」
ウルザはランス達に気づいたが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Urza noticed Rance and the others,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 申し訳なさそうに頭を下げると
部下に呼ばれて消えてしまった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then was called by a subordinate and disappeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うーむ、ウルザちゃん達に会いに来たが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, I came to see Urza and the others,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今はとても無理そうだな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but it looks like it's impossible right now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん、あそこにいるのは……」
「よう、お前らも来ていたのか」
「あら、ランス君」
「ご無沙汰しておりますわ、ランスさま」
司令部の一角には、リーザスの部隊、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In a section of the command headquarters, there was the Leesas unit,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大陸一華やかな部隊と言われる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: said to be the most glamorous unit on the continent,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 金の軍ことリーザス親衛隊がいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the Golden Army, also known as the Leesas Guard.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんでここに？」
「リア様がここまで来る以上、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Since Lady Ria came all the way here,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私達だけが城に残るわけにいかないでしょう？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: it wouldn't do for just us to stay at the castle, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それもそうか。
ジュリアはどうした？」
「そちらでおねむですわ……」
「すぴー、すぴょんょん……
んふふ、もうたべられない……」
ジュリアは椅子を三つ並べた上に寝転がり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Julia was lying down across three lined-up chairs,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 幸せそうに眠っていた。
「ま、いつも通りか……」
「それよりも後ろの錚々-ｿｳｿｳ-たる方々を……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "More than that, those prominent people behind..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスさまにどうにかして頂きたいような……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems like they want Lord Rance to do something about them..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「後ろの錚々たる方々？」
パーテーションで区切られた司令部の一角を見ると、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Looking at a corner of the command headquarters separated by a partition,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各国の姫達が静かに睨み合っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the princesses of various countries were quietly glaring at each other.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あーっ、ダーリンだー！」
「ランス……」
「こんばんは、兄様」
「なんや、夜更かしさんやね、ランス」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What's this, a night owl, huh Rance?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「また喧嘩しとったのか？　お前ら」
「んーん、そんなのしてないよー。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, we weren't doing anything like that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに喧嘩って同じ
レベルの人同士がすることよ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that people of the same level do, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あらー？　なにか言いたいのかしら？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh? Do you want to say something?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザスの女王は」
「んーんー？　別になにもー？」
「まったく……」
「まあまあ、今日くらいええんちゃうかな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, well, it's fine just for today, isn't it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コパンドンがこそっとランスにだけ耳打ちする。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Copandon whispered secretly to Rance only.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こうしとる方が皆落ち着くんよ。
口には出さんけどな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though nobody says it out loud."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんなもんか……」
「しかし、各国の姫全員集合か……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However, all the princesses of each country gathered..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そう考えると中々すごいメンバーのような
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When you think about it, it seems like quite an impressive group.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あれ？　そういえばシーラがいないな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? Come to think of it, Shila isn't here."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「一人だけ逃げたのよ！
ひどいよねー、
きっとダーリンなんてどうでもいいんだわ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She probably doesn't care about Darling at all!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「変なことを言わないで下さい……
シーラ様にはすることがあるだけです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lady Shila just has things to do."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、クリームちゃん。
なんか知ってるのか？」
「……いえ、私も詳しくは存じ上げないのですが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...No, I don't know the details either, but"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんでも数日前にパットン皇子がやってきて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Apparently, a few days ago Prince Patton came,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼女を連れて行ったとか……

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

「なんや、夜更かしさんやね、ランス」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What's this, a night owl, huh Rance?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「また喧嘩しとったのか？　お前ら」
「んーん、そんなのしてないよー。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, we weren't doing anything like that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それに喧嘩って同じ
レベルの人同士がすることよ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that people of the same level do, right?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あらー？　なにか言いたいのかしら？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh? Do you want to say something?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザスの女王は」
「んーんー？　別になにもー？」
「まったく……」
「まあまあ、今日くらいええんちゃうかな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, well, it's fine just for today, isn't it?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コパンドンがこそっとランスにだけ耳打ちする。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Copandon whispered secretly to Rance only.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こうしとる方が皆落ち着くんよ。
口には出さんけどな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though nobody says it out loud."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そんなもんか……」
「しかし、各国の姫全員集合か……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "However, all the princesses of each country gathered..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そう考えると中々すごいメンバーのような
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When you think about it, it seems like quite an impressive group.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あれ？　そういえばシーラがいないな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? Come to think of it, Shila isn't here."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「一人だけ逃げたのよ！
ひどいよねー、
きっとダーリンなんてどうでもいいんだわ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She probably doesn't care about Darling at all!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「変なことを言わないで下さい……
シーラ様にはすることがあるだけです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lady Shila just has things to do."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、クリームちゃん。
なんか知ってるのか？」
「……いえ、私も詳しくは存じ上げないのですが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...No, I don't know the details either, but"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「なんでも数日前にパットン皇子がやってきて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Apparently, a few days ago Prince Patton came,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼女を連れて行ったとか……
